name: SIMPLEQUOTE01
description: Simple quote request for one item by existing customer
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Request for Quote - ALBERTVILLE Whiteboard, green, Body: Hi,

Can you please provide a quote for one ALBERTVILLE Whiteboard, green?

Thank you,
Andy Teal

name: VERBOSEQUOTE01
description: Detailed quote request with delivery date and discount
question:
From: mark.mcarthur@contoso.com, Subject: Quote request for multiple items with delivery date, Body: Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. We are looking to purchase the following items and would like a quote:

- 5 ATLANTA Whiteboard, base
- 10 AMSTERDAM Lamp

Additionally, we require delivery by July 15th. Please let us know if this is possible and if there are any discounts available for bulk orders.

Best regards,
Mark McArthur

name: DUPLICATEITEMQUOTE01
description: Quote request with duplicate items
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Quote for multiple chairs, Body: Hi,

Could you provide a quote for the following:

- 2 MEXICO Swivel Chair, black
- 3 MEXICO Swivel Chair, black

Thanks,
Andy Teal

name: VAGUEQUOTE01
description: Vague request for quote by non-existent customer
question:
From: someone.unknown@unknown.com, Subject: Need a quote for some office furniture, Body: Hello,

Can you give me a quote for some office furniture? We need desks and chairs.

Regards,
John Doe

name: NONEXISTITEMQUOTE01
description: Quote request with non-existent item
question:
From: mark.mcarthur@contoso.com, Subject: Quote request for a non-existent item, Body: Hello,

Could you provide a quote for 5 ALPHAVILLE Whiteboard, green?

Best regards,
Mark McArthur

name: MULTIPLEITEMSQUOTE01
description: Quote request for multiple different items
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Request for quote - Multiple items, Body: Hi,

We need the following items and would like a quote:

- 2 ATHENS Desk
- 4 LONDON Swivel Chair, blue
- 6 BERLIN Guest Chair, yellow

Thank you,
Andy Teal

name: DISCOUNTQUOTE01
description: Request for quote with discount inquiry
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Quote request with discount, Body: Hi,

We are looking to order the following:

- 10 CALGARY Whiteboard, yellow

Could you provide a quote and let us know if there's any discount available for this quantity?

Best,
Andy Teal

name: NOTQUOTE01
description: Inquiry about available items, not a quote request
question:
From: mark.mcarthur@contoso.com, Subject: Inquiry about available items, Body: Hello,

Can you please provide a list of all the chairs you have available in your inventory?

Thanks,
Mark McArthur

name: SPECIFICQUOTE01
description: Specific quote request for multiple quantities
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Quote for whiteboards, Body: Hi,

Can you please provide a quote for the following:

- 3 ALBERTVILLE Whiteboard, green
- 2 GRENOBLE Whiteboard, red

Thank you,
Andy Teal

name: REQUESTWITHNOUNIT01
description: Quote request without specifying unit of measure
question:
From: mark.mcarthur@contoso.com, Subject: Quote for desks, Body: Hello,

Can you provide a quote for 5 ATHENS Desks?

Best regards,
Mark McArthur

name: NOCUSTOMERQUOTE01
description: Quote request from non-existent customer
question:
From: unknown@domain.com, Subject: Request for quote, Body: Hi,

We need a quote for the following items:

- 4 CHAMONIX Base Storage Unit
- 3 OSLO Storage Unit/Shelf

Regards,
Jane Smith

name: DUPLICATEITEMREQUEST01
description: Quote request with duplicate quantities specified separately
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Request for additional chairs, Body: Hi,

We need the following items for our new office:

- 2 LONDON Swivel Chair, blue
- 2 LONDON Swivel Chair, blue

Please provide a quote for the same.

Thank you,
Andy Teal

name: REQUESTWITHSERVICES01
description: Request for quote including services
question:
From: mark.mcarthur@contoso.com, Subject: Request for quote including services, Body: Hello,

Can you provide a quote for the following items and installation services:

- 3 INNSBRUCK Storage Unit/W.Door
- Installation services for the above items

Best regards,
Mark McArthur

name: MULTIPLEDELIVERYDATE01
description: Quote request with different delivery dates for each item
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Quote for different items with delivery dates, Body: Hi,

We would like a quote for the following items:

- 2 ATHENS Desk (delivery by July 10th)
- 4 MUNICH Swivel Chair, yellow (delivery by August 1st)

Thanks,
Andy Teal

name: VAGUENONQUOTE01
description: Vague request without explicit quote request
question:
From: someone@unknown.com, Subject: Inquiry about office furniture, Body: Hi,

Can you tell me more about the office furniture you have available?

Thanks,
Alex

name: DUPLICATECUSTOMERREQUEST01
description: Multiple requests from the same customer
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Quote request for different items, Body: Hi,

We need a quote for the following items:

- 3 BERLIN Guest Chair, yellow
- 5 AMSTERDAM Lamp

Please provide the details.

Thank you,
Andy Teal

name: REQUESTWITHNONEXISTENTUOM01
description: Quote request with non-existent unit of measure
question:
From: mark.mcarthur@contoso.com, Subject: Quote for whiteboards with specific unit, Body: Hello,

Can you provide a quote for 5 ALBERTVILLE Whiteboard, green in boxes?

Best regards,
Mark McArthur

name: QUOTEREQUESTWITHNONEXISTENTITEM01
description: Quote request with a non-existent item and existing item
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Request for quote with mixed items, Body: Hi,

We need a quote for the following items:

- 3 ATLANTIS Desk (assuming non-existent)
- 2 LONDON Swivel Chair, blue

Thank you,
Andy Teal

name: MULTILINEREQUEST01
description: Quote request for multiple items with different quantities
question:
From: mark.mcarthur@contoso.com, Subject: Quote for various office furniture, Body: Hello,

Could you provide a quote for the following items:

- 1 PARIS Guest Chair, black
- 4 CHAMONIX Base Storage Unit
- 2 ATHENS Mobile Pedestal

Best regards,
Mark McArthur

name: MULTIPLECUSTOMERREQUEST01
description: Requests for quotes from different customers
question:
From: andy.teal@contoso.com, Subject: Quote for office chairs, Body: Hi,

Could you provide a quote for 5 MEXICO Swivel Chair, black?

Thank you,
Andy Teal
